a.title: Schools Closed. Distance Learning in Effect until Further Notice

img.title: Schools Closed. Distance Learning in Effect until Further Notice

a.title: Schools Closed. Distance Learning in Effect until Further Notice

h3.a: Schools Closed. Distance Learning in Effect until Further Notice

div.div:
From the Superintendent:
Our number one priority continues to be the health and well-being of our students, teachers, and staff members. Though we currently have no confirmed cases of Coronavirus in Green Brook, we have been proactively preparing to continue...

div.p: The buildings are closed but students will continue their education by way of the district’s Distance Learning plan. Communications about this plan will come through ParentSquare. For conveience, we are also presenting that information in a folder, linked below.
